roleset.name: bend into shapes

role.descr: resulting shape that arg1 is contorted into

example.name: All arguments
example.text: She contorted her face into a look of disgust and scooted away.

example.name: No end result/shape mentioned
example.text: He was contorting the whole idea of a videogame to make his concept work.
